CustomField.description: If the user is modifying the shipping address, check this box so the integration process does not update it. This field was introduced for MMS Sales. Sales manually checks this box and it locks down so that the integration does not override the value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the user is modifying the shipping address, check this box so the integration process does not update it.
CustomField.label: User Owned Shipping Address
